name: Peppermint Lavender Foot Cream - Trial Size
description:
Premium foot lotion made with luxurious natural ingredients, most of which are Organic (marked by **), leave your hot, tired feet feeling refreshed and oh-so-soft! Paraben Free, and contains natural preservatives.  


Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil**, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil**, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)**, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice**, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil**, Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate, Palm Stearate, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Propanediol (Zemea), Peppermint Essential Oil, Lavender Essential Oil**

One 2.0 oz jar

name: Purple Reign
description:
Deep "Blurple" textured polish featuring a matte finish with ultra-fine purple and lavender glitters. All the rage!

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: Sw-alty Lemon Body Scrub Trial Size
description:
Fluffy, zingy, citrusy Salt-Sugar Scrub is good for any part of your body that needs softening up! 

Scoop out a tiny bit, rub, rub, rub some more, and wash off.  Revel in the fact how smooooooooth your skin feels after using it! Try not to get contents wet. 

Great for so many things! Feet, Gardener's Hands, Mechanic's hands, Elbows, Knees.  We won't be held responsible for dipping your cocktail glasses in it though. ;)

Ingredients: Sugar, Pink Himalayan Salt, Avocado Oil, Lemon Essential Oil. 

One 2 oz Jar

name: Flip Flop Foot Soak & Scrub
description:
This adorable flip flop fizzer will have your feet summer shoe ready in no time!

Made with premium all natural ingredients including: ground pumice, pink Himalayan salt, avocado oil, and jojoba beads all aiding in smoother, soft skin; while lemongrass, lemon, and lime essential oils smell soooooooo good and help to banish stinky feet.

To use:  

IF USING AS A SCRUB:  Wet your feet either in the shower or bath, and rub either a piece or the entire bar all over paying attention to rougher parts. Massage for as long as you like.  Rinse off.  DO NOT LET THE BAR NEAR RUNNING WATER OR IT WILL DISSOLVE LIKE A REGULAR BATH FIZZER.

IF USING AS A FOOT SOAK:  Fill your tub or basin with water. Drop either a piece or the entire foot fizzer in. Soak your feet as long as you like while dreaming of sandy beaches and cool breezes.  When done, pat feet dry.  

Ingredients:  Sodium Bicarbonate, Corn Starch, Citric Acid, Ground Pumice, Pink Himalayan Salt, Jojoba Beads, Avocado Oil, Lemongrass Essential oil, Lemon Essential Oil, Lime Essential Oil, Natural Soap Colouring


Each Flip Flop is approx. 4 1/2" x 2 1/2" x 1" deep and 140 g (4.9 oz)  - plenty big for more than one use if you desire - and will be made fresh upon ordering.

name: Miami Vice
description:
Calling to mind that extremely popular show of the 80s, this glitter polish combines pretty tropical-like colours such as bright pink hex, turquoise squares, and pure white "snow" hex glitters.

Turn up the heat, and go sock-less like Don Johnson when wearing this ;)

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: Nerdz!
description:
Reminiscent of those teeny, tart, terrific little candies, this glitter polish is packed with neon pink hex, neon pink micro, and bright blue bar glitter.

Sweet! 

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: DustBunne
description:
DustBunnee is a gorgeous ultra-light grey polish that shimmers with micro holographic glitter.  Gorgeous as a top coat over your fav shade, or equally blingy on its own!

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: Chocolate Lip Balm
description:
So cute! So "yummy"! So "Chocolately"! Smell so delicious but please don't eat them!

These adorable assorted chocolate 'pots' hold all-natural, (including cocoa butter and Vitamin E.), lip-softening balms, and will be freshly made in your choice of flavours:

*Chocolate

*Chocolate-Mint

*Chocolate-Strawberry

*Chocolate-Cherry

*Chocolate-Raspberry

*Chocolate-Fudge

PLEASE NOTE IN PAYPAL WHICH FLAVOUR YOU'D LIKE.

Each pot is 0.9 oz 

*Note, these lip balms contain almond oil, coconut oil, and beeswax; and while all-natural, they are not Vegan. Also, due to the nature of the product, it may become extra-soft in warmer environments.

Chocolate shapes will be sent randomly.

name: Natural Shaving CREAM - Small
description:
Made with premium ingredients, these shaving creams will have your skin feeling soft and minimize irritation! 

Wet your skin with warm water, smooth on a layer of shaving cream, wait a few minutes and shave away. Rinse.  Afterwards, bask in how glorious your skin feels and how baby-smooth your "partz" are!

Natural, gentle, and moisturizing ingredients are blended into the special cream. 

Scents:

Rain --- so refreshing, like after a summer shower

Sensual Sandalwood --- sexy, woodsy, and earthy

Ocean Breeze --- beautiful salty, beachy, tropical scent

Linen --- like gorgeous Egyptian cotton sheets fresh out of the dryer

White Tea & Ginger --- crisp, clean, slightly spicy, slightly musky

Dewberry --- ozone, honeydew, blackberry, and dewberry heart

Honeydew Melon --- so fresh, so sweet, so summery

Lavender --- crisp, flowered organic lavender oil

Tahitian Vanilla --- smooth vanilla bean with subtle notes of coconut

Energy --- stimulating blend grapefruit, lemon and lime, hints of fresh cucumber, jasmine, pineapple, blackberry and champagne

Lime --- fresh, crisp, and uplifting

Pair it with any of our other body products in your fav scent and you'll be smelling extra-sexay!


Ingredients: Aqua (Purified Water), Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Saponified Olive Oil, Saponified Coconut Oil, and boric acid (natural thickener) less than 0.01%, Essential oil.

One 2 oz (1/4 cup) jar

Each jar is freshly made to order!  

PLEASE NOTE IN YOUR ORDER UPON CHECKOUT WHICH SCENT YOU'D LIKE.

name: Gothy Gothy Gumdrops
description:
Like those fresh, sweet, chewy candies with the tart black liquorice flavoured gumdrops mixed in, this glitter polish will have you feeling dark, mysterious and maybe a bit macabre!

Hexes and Squares in matte black, purple, teal, and holographic silver, fuschia, and aqua glitters.

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: Glow Polishes - EACH SOLD SEPARATELY
description:
Glow baby glow!  

These colours are perfect for hot summer nights or when you're out on the town clubbing or raving! 

Left to right in photos:

Nuclear Grape (turns sheer on the nail to purple in the dark)
Pepto Pink (turns pink to pale orange in the dark)
Glow Worm (turns sheer to aqua in the dark)

Fun on their own or as a funky top coat over your fav polish!

These Mini sized bottles would make a cute gift for the Tween or Teen in your life too!

*due to the nature of this polish, it dries with a fine texture on the nail*

each bottle is 5ml

name: Cosmopolitan
description:
Fresh, modern, glitter polish in iridescent, red, black, white,  and blue squares and hexes. 

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: Sexy Shaving Balm - Trial Size
description:
Feeling a little bit rough and bumpy after shaving? Slap some shaving balm onto your skin for a smooth, soothing remedy. This premium ultra thick, rich deep moisturizing cream is full of skin nourishing oils, vitamins and proteins such as: Avocado Oil, Aloe Vera, Calendula Oil, and Vitamin E. Also great for dry patches on your elbows, hands, or all over! Ladies will like it too for their "parts"! Match it with any of our other body products in your fav scent and you'll be smelling extra-sexay! Scents: Rain --- so refreshing, like after a summer shower Sensual Sandalwood --- sexy, woodsy, and earthy Ocean Breeze --- beautiful salty, beachy, tropical scent Linen --- like gorgeous Egyptian cotton sheets fresh out of the dryer White Tea & Ginger --- crisp, clean, slightly spicy, slightly musky Dewberry --- ozone, honeydew, blackberry, and dewberry heart. Honeydew Melon --- so fresh, so sweet, so summery Lavender --- crisp, flowered organic lavender oil Tahitian Vanilla --- smooth vanilla bean with subtle notes of coconut Energy --- stimulating blend grapefruit, lemon and lime, hints of fresh cucumber, jasmine, pineapple, blackberry and champagne One 2oz (1/4 cup) Jar Each jar is freshly made to order!


Contains Emulsifying Wax NF, Vegetable Stearic Acid, Grapeseed Oil, Avocado Oil, Sunflower Oil, Glycerin, Aloe Vera Extract, Calendula Oil, Cromoist Hydrolysed Oat Protein, Vitamin E & Phenoxyethanol (and) Caprylyl Glycol (and) Sorbic Acid(preservative), and Pure Essential Fragrance

name: Sexy Shower Gels - Trial size
description:
Made with premium ingredients, these shower gels will have you feeling sexy, squeaky clean, and smooth! Perfect for men or women who love their scents a with a little more "oomph" and less "flower". Use Prihtee Partz Shower Gel and people won't be able to resist you: Your boss will give you a raise...* People will flock to you for an autograph thinking you're famous...* Modelling contracts will be thrown at your feet ...* Cars and wealth will be yours for the taking... * Gentle vegetable derived surfactants, moisturizing Glycerin, Oat Protein and Aloe Vera, lather up enough to leaving you feeling clean and refreshed! Scents: Rain --- so refreshing, like after a summer shower Sensual Sandalwood --- sexy, woodsy, and earthy Ocean Breeze --- beautiful salty, beachy, tropical scent Linen --- like gorgeous Egyptian cotton sheets fresh out of the dryer White Tea & Ginger --- crisp, clean, slightly spicy, slightly musky Dewberry --- ozone, honeydew, blackberry, and dewberry heart Honeydew Melon --- so fresh, so sweet, so summery Lavender --- crisp, flowered organic lavender oil Tahitian Vanilla --- smooth vanilla bean with subtle notes of coconut Energy --- stimulating blend grapefruit, lemon and lime, hints of fresh cucumber, jasmine, pineapple, blackberry and champagne Pair it with any of our other body products in your fav scent and you'll be smelling extra-sexay! Ingredients: Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Glycerin, Aloe Barbensis Leaf Extract,Hydrolyzed Oats, Peg-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Peg-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides (Thickener), Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol (and) Caprylyl Glycol (and) Sorbic Acid, Citric Acid, Pure Essential Oil Fragrances One 2 oz (1/4 cup) squeeze bottle Each bottle is freshly made to order!


*These examples may or may not actually occur and phritee paintz will not be held liable ;)

name: Polish up the Ying Yang
description:
Fun black and white matte "glitters" in various sizes and shapes ... you can do so much with it!  Layer it over your fav shade or use on it's own!

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: Equal!
description:
Love is love between consenting adults and we should all be equal.  Show your support whether Straight or Not with this beautiful rainbow glitzy glitter... 

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: Lip Gloss
description: This ULTRA-shiny, smooth, non-sticky, sexy lip GLOSS provides a protective layer with a formula that includes Vitamin E. It's a step more saucy than our lip balms! It's All-Natural formula rolls easily onto your lips for a soft, sexy pouty mouth! A little goes a long way! Just try not to lick your lips too much ;) "prihtee poutz lip gloss" comes in 12 yummy flavours: Vanilla, Chocolate, Peppermint, Bubblegum, Cherry, Pina Colada, Wildberry, Strawberry, Creamsicle, Raspberry, and Chocolate-Mint. OR - create your own blend! ***NEW*** Chai-Vanilla PLEASE ADD IN THE PAYPAL NOTES WHICH FLAVOUR YOU'D LIKE Each gloss is 13 ml oz and comes in an "old school" roller-ball tube. All glosses are freshly made when ordered. *Please note, these lip balms contain: almond oil, coconut oil, castor oil, beeswax, & Vitamin E; and while all-natural, they are not Vegan.

name: Foto Finishez
description:
Calling to mind some of those hipster photo editing apps that make what you've had for lunch look oh-so-cool, this sheer black glitter polish will make you look just as trendy.

Contains a mix of silver, copper, gold, and iridescent glitters in various sizes.

Swatch is over a black polish. 

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: Gangrenous - Large bottle
description:
Made in mind for my Nurse friend, this rusted old bloody looking top coat may look golden-orange, but when layered over black is when it truly shines!

Like gangrene itself, this polish flashes many shades of green, deep orange, deep pink, and sometimes even purple!

(Pssstt It's also quite pretty and subtle when applied over nothing but your fav base coat)

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: prihtee poutz lip balm
description:
This smooth and sexy lip balm provides a protective layer with a formula that includes cocoa butter and Vitamin E. 

It's All-Natural formula glides easily on your lips for a soft, sexy pouty mouth! A little goes a long way with this prihtee stick.

"prihtee poutz" come in 12 yummy flavours:  Vanilla, Chocolate, Peppermint, Bubblegum, Cherry, Pina Colada, Wildberry, Strawberry, Creamsicle, Raspberry, and Chocolate-Mint.  OR -  create your own blend! 

***NEW FLAVOUR!*** Yummy Chai-Vanilla 
Each balm is 0.07 oz 

All balms are freshly made when ordered.


*Please note, these lip balms contain almond oil, coconut oil, and beeswax; and while all-natural, they are not Vegan.  Also, due to the nature of the product, it may become extra-soft in warmer environments.

name: Gag Me With Your Spoon
description:
Like back from the 80s this like totally tubular glitter polish is like sooo gnarly when you wear it. Like fer sure!!!!!

Clear base with neon pink hex, neon orange fibres, neon yellow hex, neon green hex, iridescent hex, and matte purple hex.

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: TRACKING WITH INSURANCE OPTIONAL ADD-ON
description:
This option will be ADDED on to the "BASIC" flat rate shipping cost.  

THIS OPTION IS FOR USA CUSTOMERS ONLY.  If you live in Canada, or are International, you don't need this.

Unfortunately, Canada Post is no longer offering SURFACE shipping for small packets to the USA.  

AIR is the only option, but there are two levels.  

PLEASE NOTE:  BASIC "AIR" DOES NOT INCLUDE INSURANCE ANYMORE ON YOUR PACKAGE.  Prihtee Paintz's regular flat rate shipping is for the BASIC option only.

 <font color="red">IF YOU DECIDE NOT TO CHOSE THIS ADD-ON (which is $100 insurance and tracking) PRIHTEE PAINTZ WILL NOT REIMBURSE YOU FOR ANY LOST, STOLEN, OR DAMAGED PACKAGES THAT MAY OCCUR.  

<font color="black">Thank you for your patience and understanding. :D

name: Army Bitch
description:
Army Bitch is a loud, proud,  glossy army/olive green polish that's defending your rights to pretty nails! 

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: Zombie Cheerleader
description:
2, 4, 6, 8 what do we appreciate? Brainzzzzzzz 

Zombies can be cheerleaders too - as long as they don't jump around too much, right?

Zombie Brainz is a glitter bomb full of black and white matte diamond and hex glitters, baby-blue hex, lime green, and micro blue sparkly glitters.  For the final added touch - glow in the dark hex glitters have been added.

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: Video Game
description:
Handmade polish that's Pac(ed) man full of glitter! The 80s are alive and well in this glitter polish that's chock-full of matte red squares, holo lavender circles, small black hex, neon yellow, copper, and shard-cut turquoise.  When wearing this, you may want to "bwop bwop bwop" and eat lots of cherries.  Don't say you haven't be warned. :p

One 0.5 oz bottle

name: Carolyn Farts Turquoise
description:
A gorgeous shimmery clear glitter bomb polish with diamond, hex, and small turquoise glitters, with smattering of ultra-fine black glitter dust for added depth. 

One 0.5 oz bottle
